params.admin: The address to add as admin

params.operator: The address to add as operator

params._vrfCoordinator: Address of the Chainlink VRF Coordinator
params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract

returns.fulfilled: Whether the request has been fulfilled
returns.requester: The address that made the request

returns.balance: The LINK balance of the subscription

returns._0: True if the address is an admin
True if the address is an operator

returns.ready: Whether the adapter is properly configured and funded

returns.fulfilled: Whether the request has been fulfilled

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.randomWords: The random words generated by Chainlink VRF

params.chainlinkRequestId: The Chainlink request ID to recover

params.admin: The address to remove from admins

params.operator: The address to remove from operators

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.numWords: The number of random words to request

returns.requestId: The unique identifier for this randomness request

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._callbackGasLimit: The gas limit for the callback
params._keyHash: The key hash for the VRF

cancelRequest(bytes32).notice: Cancel a pending request (not supported in Chainlink VRF)

getRequestStatus(bytes32).notice: Get the status of a randomness request

isAdmin(address).notice: Check if an address is an admin

isOperator(address).notice: Check if an address is an operator

isReady().notice: Check if the adapter is ready to fulfill requests

isRequestFulfilled(bytes32).notice: Check if a randomness request has been fulfilled
